description: Install conda environments and setup conda configuration.
name: Conda Setup

env_dir.description: Absolute path to the directory containing conda environment files.

log_dir.description: Absolute path to a directory to write log files.

postCreateCommand: channels=$(conda config --show channels 2>/dev/null | grep 'channels:')  && [ -n "$channels" ]  && echo "Removing existing Conda channels..."  && conda config --remove-key channels;  echo "Adding conda-forge as the only channel..."  && conda config --add channels conda-forge  && echo "Setting strict channel priority..."  && conda config --set channel_priority strict  && echo "Verifying channels..."  && conda config --show channels; echo "Initializing conda..." && conda init
